title: Peter Wolf - 5 CD albums
description:
Peter Wolf is an American rock and roll musician, best known as the lead vocalist for the J. Geils Band from 1967 to 1983. He and keyboard player Seth Justman were responsible for most of the song writing. 
Creative differences followed their Freeze-Frame album, causing the J. Geils Band and Peter Wolf to part ways in 1983.

Wolf became a solo artist for the next 15 years, and recorded these 6 albums

Lights Out (1984) 
Come As You Are (1987) 
Up to No Good (1990) 
Long Line (1996) 
Fool&#039;s Parade (1998) 
Sleepless (2002) (noted as one of the 500 greatest albums of all time in Rolling Stone issue 937).

Here are 5 of them with cover art included.

Enjoy, please comment and seed.
